Content: Deputy Minister of Buddha Sasana and Democratic Governance Tissa Karaliyedda says he has decided to resign from his deputy ministerial portfolio. Deputy Minister Karaliyedda said he has handed over his resignation letter to the President. Thissa Karaliyadda assumed duties as the Deputy Minister of Buddha Sasana and Democratic Governance on March 22nd. MP Thissa Karaliyadda stated that he decided to resign from the post following certain incidents that occurred.
